entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
